title: Assessment on generated electricity
context: ยง237-13.5 Assessment on generated electricity. Any other provision of the law to the contrary notwithstanding, the levy and assessment of the general excise tax on the gross proceeds from the sale of electric power to a public utility company for resale to the public, shall be made only as a tax on the business of a producer, at the rate assessed producers, under section 237-13(2)(A). [L 1980, c 78, ยง2; am L 1981, c 103, ยง1; am L 1985, c 211, ยง1]
